fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Say Meow in the day chat. The first person who responds to the statement in a positive way will be protected with powerful defense the following night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -If the first person to reply responds with “Meow” back, both you and they will gain Invincible defense for the next two nights

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game and protect 2 people from death
